description: Hybrid V12 masterpiece. Ferrari took a 6.3-liter V12 that revs to 9,250 RPM, added an electric motor derived from their Formula 1 program, and created 950 horsepower of Italian fury wrapped in a body sculpted by the wind tunnel. LaFerrari â€” The Ferrari. Named with the confidence only Maranello could muster.
lore: 963 horsepower from a V12 and electric motors working in harmony. Ferrari said no one could buy it — they chose who was worthy. Zero was chosen.
